overview: The Bears are back and things are definitely hairier this time around when they set out to solve the murder of a gay politician gunned down by an unknown assailant at his own pool party fundraiser in the sequal to their wildly succesful comedy mystery film. Nelson, Reggie and Wood are on the case along with two heartthrobs from the first movie Hot Toddy and Detective Winters investigating a bevy of hot hunky suspects on a dangerous trail leading them from deep inside the LA leather scene to the gorgeous mountains of Big Bear, California. Where The Bears Are 2 is sure to be an instant classic among the fur-loving crowd and just about anyone else who loves side-splitting laughs and gripping suspense!
title: Where the Bears Are 2
